title: Swansea interested in West Ham forward Andre Ayew
description: Swansea are interested in bringing West Ham forward Andre Ayew back to the club, according to Sky sources.
content: West Ham value the 28-year-old at Â£20m - the price they paid Swansea to sign him in August 2016 in what was then a club-record deal.But a deal between the clubs is unlikely, with sources close to Ayew insisting he is not keen on a return to the Liberty Stadium.The Ghana international joined Swansea from Marseille in 2015 and enjoyed a superb debut campaign in England, scoring 12 goals in 35 appearances.Ayew has struggled to establish himself as a first-team regular at West Ham since his move to the club, netting 12 goals in 50 appearances.Sky sources understand Swansea are also interested in Ayew's West Ham team-mate Diafra Sakho.
